attributes.action: forget the politics, think about the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the people & the politicians, many who do care about the country, not themselves, to forget political allegiences, we all live together and need to be together, we are going through trying times as is most of the world, so lets pull together for the benefit of all of us, a national government would be good maybe a coalition of all the 3 main parties and with input from the others, we all need a voice, not from this era lets get the spirit as my parents in the war years, i.e. pull together, would not hard us, think about it PLEASE

rejection.details: Your petition does not make a point about government policy but is a matter for communication with the respective political parties.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
